    • Method Detail

      • isActuallySCM

        boolean isActuallySCM()

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        A human readable name that should be unique in the company of several SCM adapters. Normally just the name of the SCM is enough.

      • setConsoleMonitor

        void setConsoleMonitor(com.guidewire.commons.scm.IScmConsoleMonitor monitor)
        Sets the console monitor. The adapter may append any text deemed useful to the end-user, e.g. the output of commands, etc.

      • testConfiguration

        void testConfiguration()
                throws ScmAdapterException
        Test the configuration of the adapter. Any configuration error may be displayed to the user using MessageDisplay
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if configuration has issues
        ScmAdapterException

      • isScmFile

        boolean isScmFile(java.io.File file)
        Returns true if the file or directory is for SCM record keeping and is not part of the files under source control.

      • areDirsInRepo

        boolean areDirsInRepo()
        Whether directories must be added to/removed from the repository. E.g. Perforce returns false, Subversion and CVS return true.

      • fileExistsInScmRepository

        boolean fileExistsInScmRepository(java.io.File file)
                           throws ScmAdapterException
        Returns true if the file is checked in the source control manager's repository. Note that this returns false if the file is newly added. If the file was previously deleted, this will return true.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • canEdit

        boolean canEdit()
        Does this SCM adapter implement the edit() method?

      • edit

        void edit(java.io.File file)
   throws ScmAdapterException
        Opens the file for editing. The file will be in a writable state after this operation.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • isEdited

        boolean isEdited(java.io.File file)
          throws ScmAdapterException
        Returns true if the file is currently checked-out in the local user's workspace.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • create

        void create(java.io.File file)
     throws ScmAdapterException
        Adds the file to source control. The file must not exist before this is called and will be created as part of this call.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • isCreated

        boolean isCreated(java.io.File file)
           throws ScmAdapterException
        Returns true if the file is pending creation in the local user's workspace.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • delete

        void delete(java.io.File file)
     throws ScmAdapterException
        Deletes the file from source control. The file will be deleted if it exists.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • isDeleted

        boolean isDeleted(java.io.File file)
           throws ScmAdapterException
        Returns true if the file is pending deletion in the local user's workspace.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • move

        void move(java.io.File source,
          java.io.File dest)
   throws ScmAdapterException
        Moves a file to a new location. If possible this move will preserve SCM file history. At a minimum, the source file will be opened for delete; the destination file opened for add; the destination file will exist and will be writable; the source file will be deleted.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • getScmState

        IScmAdapter.ScmState getScmState(java.io.File file)
                          throws ScmAdapterException
        Returns the ScmState of the specified file.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • canSync

        boolean canSync()
        Does this SCM adapter implement the sync() method?

      • sync

        void sync(java.io.File file)
   throws ScmAdapterException
        Synchronizes/Updates the file to the head revision in source control system. This is a no-op if the SCM system is not capable of this operation.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • canRevert

        boolean canRevert()
        Does this SCM adapter implement the revert() method?

      • revert

        void revert(java.io.File... files)
     throws ScmAdapterException
        Reverts the files back to the revision previously synced from source control, discarding any pending changes that have been made. If a file was not in source control when added, the file will no longer be on disk. The files are no longer open for edits after this operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this adapter is not capable of supporting this method.
        ScmAdapterException
        See Also:
        canRevert()

      • canSubmit

        boolean canSubmit()
        Does this SCM adapter implement the submit() method?

      • submit

        void submit(java.lang.String changeDescription,
            java.io.File... files)
     throws ScmAdapterException
        Submits the files into source control. The SCM state of each file will be CHECKED_IN
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this adapter is not capable of supporting this method.
        ScmAdapterException
        See Also:
        canSubmit()

      • canGetLatest

        boolean canGetLatest()
        Does this SCM adapter implement the getLatest() method?

      • getLatest

        void getLatest(java.io.File file,
               java.io.File tempFile)
        throws ScmAdapterException
        Gets the latest version of the given file in the repository, and writes it to the temporary file specified.
        Parameters:
        file - The local file corresponding to the target repository file.
        tempFile - The temporary file to which the contents of the latest repository version are written.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException

      • getChangelist

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChangelist()
                                        throws ScmAdapterException
        Returns the current changelist.
        Returns:
        The list of files pending submission.
        Throws:
        ScmAdapterException
